name: Millie West
review: Purchase of smart products, (i.e. Smart hub with add'l products to go with it kit). Purchase date 10/23/17 with 3-5 day delivery, product never shipped. I was told they would upgrade to second day Nov. 3rd... It would go out that day.

name: Gallagher Cruz
review: I placed an order for the iRoomba 880 on 9/22/17. Called today 9/26/17 to inquire where the order is since I haven't received any further information other than the confirmation email. Was told by customer service they had called to inform me the order was cancelled because of fraud concerns, but the number I gave was incorrect because the warehouse person was told .

name: Mcgowan Padilla
review: The directions are written so a kid can understand them. It was my favorite thing to use and easy to understand and it is the best thing to use in this modern age. I would recommend this to my friends. It is very easy to install and use. It has a light to let you know it is working properly..

name: Vera Cantrell
review: The installation experience was a good one. The installation was easy. I was able to do the installation myself with very little help in doing so. There are many offered services. They range from smart lighting, smart thermostats, smart appliances and smart home theatre. You can find something that pleases everyone. I am happy with the value.

name: Shannon Stephenson
review: It is a great product, has many functions, which allow it to be useful. It is easy to use and is of great trust. My house is in good hands with this company, is fantastic. Great services. The correct value. Great experience.

name: Vilma Clemons
review: It is simple to install. All you have to do is follow the instructions and don't freelance. It took me under ten minutes to set everything to my liking. I strongly recommend it. This is something that I was really excited about. It comes with a bunch of great features and services that will fit your every need.

name: Ruth Conway
review: With regards to your email, sorry to inform but due to holiday season & huge number of orders to be processed there is some delay in the process of shipping the order, I do see that the order is already packed & should be shipped out anytime & once it's shipped out you will receive the tracking details to your email.

name: Abby Bond
review: Person representing himself with Social Security wanting information to sign us up for benefits provided by the county, AAA and AARP. Never mentioned he worked for an alarm company. Implied he worked for the county.

name: Vance Joyce
review: Their excuse for this mess was they moved their warehouse. I cancelled the order, 11/4, still in processing. I cancelled the order... Cancelled again 11/7, waiting on email and order still shows processing.
